title: Someone Like You
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:14.16] I heard that you're settled down
[00:21.05] That you found a girl and you're married now
[00:29.36] I heard that your dreams came true
[00:35.52] Guess she gave you things I didn't give to you
[00:42.89] Old friend, why are you so shy?
[00:49.53] Ain't like you to hold back or hide from the light
[00:57.05] I hate to turn up out of the blue, uninvited
[01:00.64] But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
[01:04.48] I had hoped you'd see my face
[01:06.53] And that you'd be reminded that for me, it isn't over
[01:13.72] Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[01:19.84] I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[01:26.80] Don't forget me, I beg
[01:30.48] I'll remember, you said
[01:34.07] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead
[01:40.82] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead
[01:48.63] 
[01:51.23] You know how the time flies
[01:57.12] Only yesterday was the time of our lives
[02:04.21] We were born and raised in a summer haze
[02:11.39] Bound by the surprise of our glory days
[02:19.01] I hate to turn up out of the blue, uninvited
[02:22.44] But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
[02:26.18] I had hoped you'd see my face
[02:28.55] And that you'd be reminded that for me, it isn't over
[02:34.02] 
[02:36.82] Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[02:43.13] I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[02:50.58] Don't forget me, I beg
[02:54.09] I'll remember, you said
[02:57.10] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead
[03:05.03] Nothing compares, no worries or cares
[03:08.96] Regrets and mistakes, they're memories made
[03:12.66] Who would have known how bittersweet this would taste?
[03:21.29] 
[03:24.09] Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[03:30.32] I wish nothing but the best for you
[03:37.08] Don't forget me, I beg
[03:40.68] I'll remember, you said
[03:44.36] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead
[03:52.23] Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[03:58.83] I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[04:05.84] Don't forget me, I beg
[04:09.17] I'll remember, you said
[04:12.55] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead
[04:19.89] Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead...
[04:26.08]
